# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : request_middleware.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2021/10/19 10:14
@Description :
"""
import logging
import re

from django.db.utils import IntegrityError
from django.http import JsonResponse
from django.utils.deprecation import MiddlewareMixin
from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.exceptions import AuthenticationFailed, APIException
from rest_framework.response import Response

from client.models.company import Company, S1UserCompanyMap
from utils.jwt_util import token_2_user_info

ACCOUNT_LOGIN_FAILED_STATUS_CODE = 598

logger = logging.getLogger('scan_app')

client_v1_prefix = "/api/v1/scf/client"
client_v1_1_0_prefix = '/api/v1_1_0/scf/client'
client_prefixes = [client_v1_prefix, client_v1_1_0_prefix]

# 不需要获取request.company的URL
WHITE_LIST = [
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/login/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/upload/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/get_address/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/template/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/img/code/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/phone/code/with_number/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/register/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/phone/is_valid/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/company_info/\d+/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/company_info/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/company_enclosure_info/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/company_enclosure_info/\d+/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/company_type/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/credit_manage/time_limit/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/business/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/credit_manage/approval/history/\d+/",
    f"{client_v1_prefix}/common_credit_detail/\d+/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/pwd/forget/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/pwd/reset/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/phone/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/evidence_type/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/login_code/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/payment/authentication/\w+/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/payment/info/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/payer/info/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/financing/status/",  # 融资项目-列表页-获取项目状态
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/finance/project/",  # 融资项目-列表页
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/companies/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/credit_manage/phone/code/send/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/password/phone_code/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/financing/download/",  # 融资项目-下载合同/放款凭证
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/contract_agreement/type/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/reset/password/phone_code/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/ocr/business_license/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/ocr/id_card/",
    f"{client_v1_1_0_prefix}/credit_manage/open/payfile/",
]

from rest_framework import status



[文档]class RequestMiddleware(MiddlewareMixin):


[文档]    def process_request(self, request):
        path = str(request.path)
        if any(map(lambda x: path.startswith(x), client_prefixes)):
            # 正则查询是否命中白名单
            search_result = map(lambda x: bool(re.search(x, path)), WHITE_LIST)
            # 如果都没有命中白名单 那么则需要给request对象设置company属性
            if sum(list(search_result)) == 0:
                resp = {
                    'code': status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR,
                    'data': None
                }
                company_uid = request.headers.get("Elab-Company")
                if not company_uid:
                    resp['msg'] = '请携带企业头信息'
                    return JsonResponse(data=resp, status=status.HTTP_200_OK)
                try:
                    # token format: Bear token
                    auth_token = request.META.get('HTTP_AUTHORIZATION', b'').split()[1]
                    user_info = token_2_user_info(auth_token)
                    company = Company.objects.get(uid=company_uid)
                    if not S1UserCompanyMap.objects.filter(
                            s1_user_id=user_info["user_id"],
                            company__id=company.id,
                            is_deleted=False
                    ).exists():
                        resp['msg'] = '你没有权限'
                        return JsonResponse(data=resp, status=status.HTTP_200_OK)
                    setattr(request, "company", company)
                except Company.DoesNotExist:
                    resp['msg'] = '请携带正确企业头信息'
                    return JsonResponse(data=resp, status=status.HTTP_200_OK)
                except IndexError as e:
                    resp['msg'] = '请登录'
                    return JsonResponse(data=resp, status=status.HTTP_200_OK)
        else:
            if hasattr(request, "company"):
                delattr(request, "company")



[文档]    def process_response(self, request, response):
        """
        重写返回逻辑
        @param request:
        @param response:
        @return:
        """
        resp = {}
        if isinstance(response, Response):
            if str(response.status_code)[:1] == "2":
                data = response.data
                if data is None:
                    data = {}
                if isinstance(data, list):
                    resp["code"] = status.HTTP_200_OK
                    resp["msg"] = "ok"
                    resp["data"] = data
                    response.data = resp
                    response._is_rendered = False
                    response.render()
                    return response
                code = status.HTTP_200_OK
                msg = "ok"
                if "code" in data:
                    code = data.pop("code")
                if "msg" in data:
                    msg = data.pop("msg")
                resp["code"] = code
                resp["msg"] = msg
                if "data" in data.keys() and len(data.keys()) == 1:
                    resp["data"] = data.pop("data")
                else:
                    resp["data"] = data
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR:
                resp["code"] = response.data.get("code", status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
                resp["msg"] = response.data.get("detail", "")
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == status.HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST:
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = f"参数缺失或不符合规范，请检查 {response.data}"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED:
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = "请登录"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == status.HTTP_403_FORBIDDEN:
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = "暂无权限，请联系管理员。"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == status.HTTP_406_NOT_ACCEPTABLE:
                msg = response.data.get('detail', "")
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = msg if msg else f"参数缺失或不符合规范，请检查 {response.data}"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            elif response.status_code == ACCOUNT_LOGIN_FAILED_STATUS_CODE:
                msg = response.data.get('detail', "")
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = msg if msg else f"参数缺失或不符合规范，请检查 {response.data}"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            else:
                resp["code"] = response.status_code
                resp["msg"] = "后端走神儿了，请稍后再试"
                resp["data"] = None
                response.data = resp
            response.status_code = status.HTTP_200_OK
            response._is_rendered = False
            response.render()
        return response



[文档]    def process_exception(self, request, exception):
        """
        捕捉异常
        @param request:
        @param exception:
        @return:
        """
        resp = {}
        if isinstance(exception, AuthenticationFailed):
            resp["code"] = status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED
            resp["msg"] = "请登录"
        elif isinstance(exception, IntegrityError):
            pattern = re.compile(r'=\((.*?)\) already exists')
            result = pattern.search(str(exception))
            if result:
                repeat_field = result.group(1).split(',')[-1]
                resp["code"] = status.HTTP_406_NOT_ACCEPTABLE
                resp["msg"] = f"{repeat_field} 已存在！"
            else:
                resp["code"] = status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
                resp["msg"] = f"后端拥挤，请稍后再试:{str(exception)}"
        else:
            resp["code"] = status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
            resp["msg"] = f"后端拥挤，请稍后再试:{str(exception)}"
        resp["data"] = None
        # logger.error(f"错误信息:{str(exception)}")
        logger.exception(exception)
        response = JsonResponse(data=resp, status=status.HTTP_200_OK)
        return response
